original_title: 訪問先でおもちゃの実演販売をするトップセールスレディ 水川スミレ
overview: Mizukawa Sumire works as a salesperson for an adult toys company. Her strong selling point?, she hides some lingerie under her coat and her convincing abilities are over the top. M
title: Top sales lady Mizukawa Sumire Who Performs Toy Demonstration Sale At A Visit
